title: Minister hails PTDC’s role in advancing tourism sector
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 26 (APP): Minister of State Mubarak Zeb Khan praised the Pakistan Tourism Development Corporation (PTDC) for its relentless efforts to promote tourism in Pakistan.
As the Chief Guest at the 3rd Pakistan International Tourism Investment Conference 2025, he emphasized the government’s commitment to bolstering the tourism sector, recognizing its potential as a key driver of investment and economic growth.
The conference, themed ‘Tourism and Sustainable Transformation,’ was a collaborative effort between PTDC and other stakeholders, including ambassadors and industry leaders.
He highlighted that such initiatives attract investment and foster greater participation from tourism-related enterprises, reaffirming the government’s support for the sector’s growth.
He also congratulated Brain Designer CEO Muhammad Rauf Raja and his team on successfully hosting the event, describing it as a significant step toward sustainable tourism development.”
